fulltext:
Curriculum Vitae 
Name 
BUI DUC VIET 
Nationality 
VIET NAM 
Date of Birth 
1990/08/17 
Gender 
Male 
Address 
370 TO KY , TAN CHANH HIEP Ward, 
District 12, HCM City, VIET NAM 
Telephone 
076 884 92 93 
E-mail 
buiducviet.90@gmail.com  
Summary 
Six years’ experience in software industry as test engineer in both manual and automation. Involved in 
many phases of typical Software Development Lifecycle such as analyzing business requirements, 
testing, researching and training new technologies. 
Working Experience 
2012-Now: LogiGear 
Projects: 
- 
Test Architect: automation test tool which used to test desktop app, mobile app and 
web app. Able to integrate with test manager tools such as TFS, Zephyr and HP Quality 
Center. 
- 
TA4VS: automation test tool which integrated with Visual Studio and TFS ecosystem. 
Using Coded UI technique. 
Role:  
- 
Senior Test Engineer (manual and automation), DevOps. 
Responsibilities: 
- 
Playing role as key member. Joining review and analyzing requirement.  
- 
Planning and managing testing tasks of member. 
- 
Providing solution for automation testing and solving automation issue. 
- 
Training member. 
- 
Involve in building and managing CI/CD process. 
Awards: 
- 
Top/star employee. 
- 
Employee of the Year 2013. 
2012: University 
Project:  
- 
E-Health System (capstone project): provides a solution to apply IT to manage business 
processes of Tan Binh hospital. Customer Anh Quan Company (www.edusoft.net.vn). 
Role: Business Analyst, Test Leader. 
Education Background 
Van Lang University: 
Studied Carnegie Mellon University (CMU) program at Information Technology faculty, Van Lang 
University. Graduated July, 2012. 
Certificates from Carnegie Mellon University. 
- 
Fundamentals of Computing 1 
- 
Introduction To Software Engineering 
- 
Introduction to Computer Networks and Communication 
- 
Fundamentals of Computing 2 
- 
Object Oriented Programming-C++ 
- 
Requirement Engineering 
- 
Software Project Management 
- 
Computer Science for Practicing Engineers 
- 
Software Testing 
- 
Software Measurement and Analysis 
- 
Application Development Practices 
Awards:  
- 
Boeing Scholarship for CMU program. 
- 
Van Lang University Scholarship. 
Skill 
Management skill 
- 
Good manage and training team member. 
- 
Good understanding in software development life cycle (Scrum). 
Programming skill 
- 
Familiar with Python and C# programming language. 
- 
Familiar with API testing (RESTFul and SOAP). 
- 
Experienced with Selenium WebDriver. 
- 
Experienced with setting up and using Docker. 
- 
Have deep knowledge in integrating with external system (TFS, VSTS, QC and Zephyr). 
Soft skill 
- 
Quick learning 
- 
Presentation skill 
- 
Listening skill 
- 
Problem solving 
- 
Self-motivated
